mapper.select: select username, password from account a where a.email = #{email} and a.id = 19

select concat(a.account_id,'') as account_id, a.username, a.email, a.dept, a.phone, d.role_name, concat(d.id,'') as role_id, DATE_FORMAT(join_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as join_date, group_concat(c.resources_id) as resourceCodeList, group_concat(c.name ORDER BY c.resources_id ASC) as resourceList from account a left outer join account_resource b on a.account_id = b.account_id left outer join resources c on b.resources_id = c.resources_id inner join role d on a.id = d.id where a.account_id = #{account_id} group by a.account_id, a.username, a.email, a.phone, d.role_name, d.id, DATE_FORMAT(join_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')

select concat(a.account_id,'') as account_id, concat(a.username,'') as username, concat(a.email,'') as email, case when concat(a.allowance,'') = '1' then '승인' else '신청' end as allowance, concat(a.phone,'') as phone, concat(d.role_name,'') as role_name, ifnull(dept,'') as dept, DATE_FORMAT(a.join_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as join_date, group_concat(c.resources_id) as resourceCodeList, group_concat(c.name ORDER BY c.resources_id ASC) as resourceList from account a left outer join account_resource b on a.account_id = b.account_id left outer join resources c on b.resources_id = c.resources_id and c.resources_id <> 35 inner join role d on a.id = d.id where 1=1
and ifnull(allowance,0) = #{allowance}
and date_format(a.join_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%')
and a.${searchType} like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%')
and ( a.username like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%') or a.email like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%') or a.phone like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%') or date_format(a.join_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%') or a.dept like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%') )
group by a.account_id, a.username, a.email, a.allowance, a.phone, d.role_name, DATE_FORMAT(join_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
mapper.update: update account set allowance = 1 where account_id in (?)
delete from account_resource where account_id in (?)
update account set access_key = #{access_key}, client_ip=#{client_ip} where email = #{email}
mapper.delete: delete from account where account_id in (?)
